description: Are you tired of dull knives or blades? Are you looking for a versatile sharstone that can be used on all different types of knives? Are you looking for a multi-purpose sharpening stone that can be used with differentes tool types? Our knife sharpening stone set is a great investment. Keep your everyday kitchen knives extremely sharp with this 1000/6000 grit Sharp Pebble Dual Grit Water-stone. Sharp knives need less brute force to cut than dull knives. How to use it Soak it in water for 20 minutes, put it in the bamboo base with rubber holder on a flat surface. Clip the guide on knife. Use the 400 grit side for rough grinding in 10~30 degree angle, push the knife with a little push Then use the 1000 grit side for fine grinding Use 3000 grit side for fine grinding in 10~30 degree angle gently for 15 minutes. Then use 8000 grit side for mirror polishing for 10 minutes. Use leather strop to polish blade and removing burr. Use flattening stone to keep your water stones flat. Keep some water on the stone to stay cool.stones 400 Grit: Used on damaged knives, For rough grinding fix big gaps restore sharpeness to repair damaged or chipped edges. 1000 Grit: It can quickly sharpen the small edge of the knife, sharpen knives and tools that are not very dull. 3000 Grit: Daily use whetstone, Make edge of most knives and tools extremely sharp. 8000 Grit: For ultra-fine finishing and to refine your blade, polish edge and make it smooth and bright.After honing, clean the knife with wet cloth or water, then dry it. Use a soft brush to clean the stone, then put it in a ventilated place to dry. There is an old saying: A dull knife is more dangerous than a sharp knife. With finely polished razor-sharp edges using whetstone, your knives will need less force to get through, giving you more control, reducing stress, preventing injuries to your wrist and hand. With sharp knives, you can finely cut and properly chop veggies & meat allowing the cooking method to penetrate deeper.
